data.text: @ProfEdWild @liz_gordon Please retweet, VERY RAW BUT VERY HONEST; Is This What Lewy Body`s Dementia Sounds Like? https://t.co/TTGLs3ySRv via @LinkedIn
@ProfEdWild Lot’s of Propaganda against Tories fair play to committed people like your self. Tories by nature Business minded hence Boris lies.
Both were happy to be given correct information about the vaccine and both made the sensible decision to go ahead with it.

These were smart, educated healthcare workers who’ve been duped into taking malicious, false Facebook posts at face value. We really need to re-evaluate the harms social media corporations are wilfully abetting.
Here’s what does interfere with infertility: spending weeks sedated on a ventilator on ITU with multi organ failure due to COVID - a vaccine-preventable illness.
